content: lion brand pattern # 60066 skill level easy level 2 microspun article #910 3 colors 1 ball each *lavender buttercup lime * crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm split ring stitch markers petal motifs make 10 with a and 2 with b sew petals to form front and back work handle in row see also 60065 child s tulip purse 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/childs-tulip-purse
